title: Episode #1.1
episode_desc: Afflicted by fainting spells, part-time cleaner Meryem confides in psychologist Peri - but she's reluctant to reveal one detail.
show_desc: A group of unique characters from dramatically different socio-cultural backgrounds meeting in startling circumstances in the vibrant and colorful city of Istanbul, - some by chance and some by force of will.

title: Episode #1.2
episode_desc: Ruhiye's condition deteriorates under Yasin's maltreatment. Peri crosses paths with Melisa. Meryem broaches a sensitive subject with Peri.
show_desc: A group of unique characters from dramatically different socio-cultural backgrounds meeting in startling circumstances in the vibrant and colorful city of Istanbul, - some by chance and some by force of will.

title: Episode #1.3
episode_desc: After Ruhiye's upsetting dream, Yasin encounters Hayrunnisa, the hodja's daughter. Melisa asks Peri to face her biases. Gülbin catches Sinan unawares.
show_desc: A group of unique characters from dramatically different socio-cultural backgrounds meeting in startling circumstances in the vibrant and colorful city of Istanbul, - some by chance and some by force of will.

title: Episode #1.4
episode_desc: Meryem tells Peri about her star-struck encounter. Tensions come to a head between Gülbin and her sister. Yasin orders Meryem to stop visiting Peri.
show_desc: A group of unique characters from dramatically different socio-cultural backgrounds meeting in startling circumstances in the vibrant and colorful city of Istanbul, - some by chance and some by force of will.

title: Episode #1.5
episode_desc: A suspicious Meryem questions Yasin about Hayrunnisa, who grapples with guilt in the wake of tragedy. Ruhiye, Yasin and Meryem head for the village.

title: Episode #1.6
episode_desc: Gülbin ends her sessions with Peri, who reaches a breaking point. Ruhiye revisits a dark chapter in her past. An unwelcome figure follows Burcu.

title: Episode #1.7
episode_desc: A connection grows between Hilmi and Meryem. At Semiha's house, Ruhiye makes an earth-shattering revelation.
show_desc: A group of unique characters from dramatically different socio-cultural backgrounds meeting in startling circumstances in the vibrant and colorful city of Istanbul, - some by chance and some by force of will.

title: Episode #1.8
episode_desc: Peri talks to Meryem about repressed emotions. Ruhiye and Yasin make amends. Hayrunnisa sets off on her own path.
show_desc: A group of unique characters from dramatically different socio-cultural backgrounds meeting in startling circumstances in the vibrant and colorful city of Istanbul, - some by chance and some by force of will.
